author: David Kent
title: 7 facts about Venezuelans in the U.S.
description:
The number of Venezuelans in the U.S. has more than doubled in five years, to about 1.2 million. Here's what we know about this population.
The post 7 facts about Venezuelans in the U.S. appeared first on Pew Research Center.
